attributes.action: keep james bulgers killers locked up for their whole life
attributes.additional_details: the killers of james bulger should be locked up for the rest of their lives and die in prison for the heinous crime they commited.as for even an adult to do what those horrible children done to that young boy is shocking but for those actions to be carried out by children is TRULY shocking and to do those things at a young age in popular view shows that they have no hope as adults outside of prison in a civilised society or in any society they are im afraid damaged goods whether mentally ill or just pure evil they should never the less be allowed to live a life out side of prison they served just 8 years locked away poor james will spend forever in the grave all of his parents dreams and wishes in the same grave all down to these pair of wicked people they should be given the same chance they gave james...NONE
